website_summaries.verdict: While it isn't particularly fancy, the Energizer Power & Play Charging System for the PlayStation 3 is one of the more compact and versatile charging stations for PS3 wireless controllers on the market.
pros: charges up to four PS3 controllers at once if you supply two extra USB cables
charges other gadgets via USB with optional cables
cons: weighted stand would make it easier to dock and undock controllers

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting
customer_reviews.text: We still use this charger the PS3 we have in our household. It charges controllers in a reasonable amount of time. Since we have had it for about 10 years now, it is worth a buy and try and see if you get the results that we have. The only negative it can be a bit difficult to place on charger, but once you get the hang of it, it is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bpink40

customer_reviews.title: Rolled The Dice and Lost
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons ps3 and it never would really charge right. My buddy has one and it works great so we got one. After reading the reviews it seems you are rolling the dice on this if it works or not. Ours didnt. Once you got it to connect, which would take a while fidgeting it around it would show red for charging and then go straight to green on a dead controller. I ended up just charging them on my pc through an extra USB port. We recently got an Xbox One and I wont waste my hard earned money on these anymore. I hope this helps. Happy Shopping!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Housden

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to go along with his other PS Christmas gifts . He is always complains about dead controller or that they die to fast . This is great for someone who has more then 2 controllers because you can have 2 charger on the stand and 2 charging on the PS3 . To be honest it looks kind of cheaply made when you open it but so far we have been using it about a month now and it works perfectly . This is a great product for any gamer and it is a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in perfect and even has 2 USB plug in ports on ...
customer_reviews.text: This does EXACTLY what they said it would. It charges 2 PS3 controllers independently from the console. Plugs in perfect and even has 2 USB plug in ports on the side for other controllers or anything that needs to be charged with a USB. Update... The 2 USB ports on the side are not working, but the chargers are working great. So I took one star off for the ports.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The red/green indicators are really nice. Only complaint might be that the controllers fit ...
customer_reviews.text: Charges two PS3 controllers at once without having them connected to the actual console. Works for me! The red/green indicators are really nice. Only complaint might be that the controllers fit in a little too snugly. It does tend to be a little difficult to seat them, but that's not a big deal. They charge just fine. Even better, I somehow thought this was going to take up more space than it does. This is actually a huge space saver. The controllers charge quickly, and it's overall worth the price so far.
customer_reviews.author: DragonXeroTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple to use charger!
customer_reviews.text: I had an official PS charger for my remotes, but it seemed to stop working after many years, so I found this one here. It is surprising how difficult it is to find a charger with glowing reviews! Anyway, decided to pull the trigger on this one and it has worked really well! The design is simple and the charger changes colors when charging is done, so it is super simple to use! I have been very happy with this charger and it continues to work well. I would definitely recommend to anyone who is using a PS3!
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Makes my gaming life a little easier.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something that would charge the controllers without having the system to be on or using the USB ports. This one does the trick. Have not had it too long but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Funkybrother1979

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: Unless you have these type of outlets at your place, don't buy this. This isn't a standard American plug. Can't leave any more of a review since I can't use it. Very annoyed!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Beckmann

customer_reviews.title: Good for Charging 2 Dual Shock Controllers
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a couple of weeks now and it works well. As others have said it can be a little tricky to line up the mini-USB port to the charging station but it is not that huge a deal for me. Sometimes I have to pick up the whole stand to line it up. For what is essentially a plastic base with a couple of connectors that plugs into a power brick it could be better in that regard and priced a little less. (I paid $27) However, overall I am happy with it as it does what I need it to do. (eliminates using cables)
customer_reviews.author: Carl S.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solid product. It charges two PS3 controllers and is quite sturdy. When you plug in a controller a light will turn red indicating that the controller is charging. When the controller is fully charged the light will become green. I was sick of having to charge my controllers with the USB cable that was provided with my PS3 so this was a great purchase in my opinion. Hopefully this charger will be able to hold up for awhile, I've heard some stories about these types of chargers breaking after a few weeks/months. However, as of right now, I have only great things to say about this item.
customer_reviews.author: Russell F. Grimm

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with PS3 Bluetooth Headset 2.0
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product that is offered at a fair price. My one issue is that the adaptor for the Headset Device will not work if you own the PS3 2.0, which I do. However, you can simply attach the USB cable that comes with the Headset and attach it to the Charging Station. The best thing about this product is that you can charge you controllers and your headset without firing up your PS3. If you are willing to circumvent the headset issue, then this product is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Primotenore

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work with all controllers
customer_reviews.text: You need to have the Playstation brand controllers for this to work. We bought after market controllers and they simply do not fit. Luckily, there is an external USB port on the side, so we have attached the cables we need to that in order to change the after market controller. Trouble is, it's the after market ones the kids love the most. Their favorites are clear - one that glows blue and the other that glows pink (can you tell I have a boy and a girl in the house?)
customer_reviews.author: Babbo

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months of usage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 3 month ago. Used it roughly 6 times if not less and today my remote control was not working, so I thought ok needs a charge, I put the remote onto this unit and the red light did not come on, so I figured ok seriously dead battery, waited 3 hours, still not working. So its only as good as the warranty, then its useless? I of course cannot find the original packaging so now out another $20 to get another one, or something similiar. So keep the warranty or you will get stuck with less money for your gaming more money on this type of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Can be a bit tricky lining up the ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Can be a bit tricky lining up the ports for charging, but you can you charge both at the same time. Have had times when one was done before the other so I don't think it always just does a default time frame regardless of battery level. I don't leave these plugged in all the time but from what I've read, you can. I just plug them in when they need charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good on a Desk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wanting a charger that shows off a little unlike pretty much all other chargers. I have to commend them for putting in the color changing LED's behind the controllers that makes it look like the lite is curving around the controller. The LED indicator actually works too despite what some say. If you have it fully charges it charges it for 5 min. but then gives up and the light turns green compared to 2 hours before it does. My only gripe is that the extra USB port on the side only puts out enough power to charge the small headset and nothing bigger like my wireless stereo headset for PS3.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Worked, until it didnt
customer_reviews.text: Top port stopped working after not to long. Great concept, but a bit difficult to see to plug in the cobtrolers
customer_reviews.author: R. Gough

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this charger today and plugged it in to charge right away. So far it looks good. The peices holding the controllers on are sturdy making sure the controllers don't move while being charged. I love the red lighting that turns green when it's fully charged. This charger is also very sleek and awesome looking to match my ps3. I really hope this charger works with ps4 controllers too. Overall this is a good product and well worth the $20! I haven't found any cons yet but I will edit this review if i do.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Y.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Mount Remotes, Great Charge
customer_reviews.text: Our original high-end charger broke after a couple of years and we bought this as a replacement. I like this one 10x better because it's way easier to mount the remotes onto the micro USB. With the old one we had to struggle to get the remote to latch and it was a huge pain. This has worked perfectly, no issues, full charge every time. I also like that it doesn't take up very much space. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Marie

customer_reviews.title: After charging all night the controllers are holding a charge and working just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that my controllers were DOA as I could not get them to charge using the PlayStation. Unfortunately they both sat uncharged for some time when I decided to dig out the old system to play it again. Not wanting to buy new controllers, I ordered this charger to see if it would work. After charging all night the controllers are holding a charge and working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: RyanH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I had 2 controllers that just weren't fully charging when they were connected to our PS3. We would watch a couple hour movie and leave the controllers connected to charge, but they still would only show as 1/2 charged. What made matters worse was that my playstation resides in our comm closet next to our living room, so playing with the controllers plugged in really wasn't an option. I purchased this charging station and it worked perfectly. One of the controllers took over a day to fully charge, but at least I got it to be fully charged. I love the LED lights that are RED when charging and change to GREEN when fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: SleepDPrived

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2010. The bottom rack charging port stopped working somewhere along the lines, but the other was still good. The side usb was never really used, but was in working condition. We lost the power cord recently, which made me realize how long we've had this charger for. Worth the money in my opinion. :]
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V.

customer_reviews.title: ) It's an easy way to keep two controllers charged and ready to ...
customer_reviews.text: We've had the Playstation 3 Energizer for years now and it's still charging our controllers without a hitch. (It's seen quite a few of the controllers come and go as they wear out much more quickly than this charger.) It's an easy way to keep two controllers charged and ready to go. Well worth the money for the convenience and longevity we've enjoyed from it's use.
customer_reviews.author: chubstuff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last month and I am glad I did. We were using the USB hookup on the PS3, but I hated leaving it running when not in use. I didn't want to wear it out charging our controllers. This system is nice and works flawlessly. It is simple to hook up the controller. Just align it with the micro port on the remote and push it in. The system holds the remotes easily and in place. We like that it glows as well to indicate when they are still charging and fully charged. It is a great product and charges very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Langston

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I debated buying this for a long time. I figured it was a waste of money and it wouldn't really serve a purpose. Turns out I was wrong. I broke down one day and figured I would try it and I really like it. I like the convenience of having a stand hold my controller and I like that it is constantly charging them. If one of my controller's battery is low, since I have three, I just swap one out for another and I am ready to get back in the game. It's a great product and I get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Certainly makes it look flashy!
customer_reviews.text: The charging station isn't really necessary, but it sure looks flashy and attractive when I got the controllers plugged in. When the red light turns on, it's charging. When the lights turn green it's all done. And it can do all this with the playstation off! (I turn off the PS3 switch in the back every night too) The PS3 heats up really quickly and I didn't want to keep it on just to charge the controllers. With the energizer charging station, I just put the controllers into the recharge station, turn off the PS3, go to sleep, and it's all ready to go by morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sunyee

customer_reviews.title: Just what i was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for recharging your PlayStation 3 controllers. It has room for 2, and they clip securely to the unit while charging. A red light glows when they are charging, then it changes to green when it is done. Very nice. Well worth it to save the hassle of alternative recharging methods.
customer_reviews.author: BronxD

customer_reviews.title: This has been a lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My kids play disney infinity alot and wear down the battery on the controllers. I have the ps3 and it shuts off after a short time from non use automatically. Made it really frusterating when trying to charge controllers because if the ps3 shuts off, so does the charging. So, I got this which plugs into the wall and charges them seperate from the console. Works great..looks great and no more dead batteries! Lights indicate when they are charged by turning green. So happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: JamieLF82

customer_reviews.title: Great looking & Very Good Charger
customer_reviews.text: I really don't have any bad things to say about this charger, except that placing the controllers into the charging dock is a little difficult especially at first. You have to angle it just right to get the mini USB female end of the controller into the mini usb male end on the charging station. I guess once you do it a few times it gets much easier. Unfortunately with the Playstation network down I have not had the opportunity to practice it too much yet. The look and evrything else about the charger is great and it has the adapter for charging the bluetooth earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Cardarelli

customer_reviews.title: Works great...for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: This charger works great when you first get it. After a while you may notice it is a little difficult to get the controller to plug into the USB port...as time goes by, plugging in the controller is more difficult as the USB plugs becomes distorted and will not make contact with the controller. I bent the USB plugs on the charger with a pair of needle nose pliers and the charger was working better for a little while, but quickly started acting up again...I dont believe there is enough support for the controllers to keep the USB plugs from being distorted.
customer_reviews.author: Romulus Pendergrass

customer_reviews.title: Playstation charger
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a present. I think it's pretty ugly because it doesn't match my living decor at all, but it keeps our controllers charged, so it serves its purpose. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because sometimes it's really difficult and takes a lot of finagaling to get it to plug into the controller right. I don't know if the plug moved or something, but sometimes the controllers slide right in, other times it takes forever, and that's kind of annoying. I do like thought that the color of light changes when it's fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality actually broke one of my controllers and I have no idea what I did with it
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: I love this charger
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to charge the controllers for the ps3 unit, other then being plugged directly into the unit. It always looked so messy. This was the perfect choice. When you plug them in, they halo red. When they're fully charged they turn green. I could set the chargers to the side, so they aren't in view when you watch tv. It looks so much neater. And charges quickly. We have 2 PS3 units (for the Blue Ray as well as the games) so I purchased a second charger. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Daly

customer_reviews.title: Great product for charging controllers
customer_reviews.text: The only issue that I have with this device is that the controllers don't slide on as easily as the Energizer charger for the XBox 360 controllers. You actually have to move the controller around a little to line it up. I didn't deduct any stars for this, as it is caused by the shape of the PS3 controller, and the device is not at fault. Overall, it's a great product. One other downside is that the plug is slightly bulky... about the size of the plug used for an Android phone. So you'll want to use one of the offset outlets on your surge protector if you have one available.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wietrzykowski

customer_reviews.title: The Best Charger out there.....just a little too PRICEY!!
customer_reviews.text: ...Let me start off my saying that this is the most space efficent...stylish looking charger i have ever owned...theres nothing better than a product doing its duty with some style to go along with it. The charge station itself...is extremely usefull..my only complaint is the $29.00 price tag on it...because as good as it looks we all have to keep in mind that its just a charger...and the price tag is pretty steep for a product that its only intent is too charge your PS3 Controllers...Aside from the price tag on the charger..it looks wonderfull and it performs its duty. if you dont mind shedding out the money for it....I Highly Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HarlemFella

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. My Dualshock 3s fit perfectly, though the initial resistance when pushing a controller in was a little surprising. The per-controller LED to show charge status is a very nice touch, too. We'll see how this works in six months to a year, but for now it's getting the job done very very well. Okay, it's been a bit longer than a year-- I got this in 2014, and I'm still using it in 2018 on a day to day basis. It was worth it then, still worth it now.
customer_reviews.author: Firehawke

customer_reviews.title: Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play...
customer_reviews.text: Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play...; Item performs as expected; it requires a little more care to plug the controllers in then into the x box version. 01/10/2016 controllers are starting to fail. they are either not charging, or holding a charge. Almost two years is not bad, but i wish i could just change out a battery pack like with my x box controllers. Charger stand still appears to be functioning.
customer_reviews.author: oshirenshi

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: This is great for our four controllers because we can charge two while the others are in use. At this point, we've had it for a little while and I'm unsure both ports are still working or if just the lights aren't working properly, but it has taken quite a beating from us, dogs, and two kids. I would consider this one again if we need to replace ours.
customer_reviews.author: ashlie

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the PS3 controller
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it, just what he wanted. Works great with his PS3 controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazdnu

customer_reviews.title: Charger, it charges.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is neat, it's the ideal place to place your controllers. Aaaaaannnddd, you never have to worry about them being out of juice, (Assuming you dont get too drunk and forget to plug them in.) It's kind of a pain to get them to plug in the first try, usually take some fumbling around to find the hole. Now all I need is a friend to use the second controller I bought.
customer_reviews.author: geoff

customer_reviews.title: ... been using this a week but it has been great. It's very convenient to have the controllers always ...
customer_reviews.text: We've only been using this a week but it has been great. It's very convenient to have the controllers always charged without having to leave the PS3 on all time. One of our controllers is a generic brand but it still fits well on this charger. It is a little bit tricky to get the controllers plugged in (especially in a darkened theater room) but not having to add a big ugly magnetic clip to your controller to use the charger is worth a few extra seconds of wiggling in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much a USB cable with a fancy stand.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you manage to get it for cheap; it is definitely not worth it if it costs $30 (normal price). When you insert the controllers, the LED lights will turn turn red until the battery is fully charged (then it turns green). To the side of the unit, there are some extra usb ports that you can hook up other devices to charge as well (i.e. iPod, extra remotes). It is solidly built and it looks very cool. Other than that, I suggestion is not to get it at full price, wait until there is sale like I did when it came down to $10.
customer_reviews.author: L. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping my controllers charged. I love this one, specifically, because my PS3 controllers seem to refuse to charge from normal phone power bricks or anything, so I needed an external charger. Doesn't to take too long to charge!
customer_reviews.author: EposVox

customer_reviews.title: good for the money
customer_reviews.text: works great. Be careful when plugging to charge. Contacts are very sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It actually works. I didn't have high hopes for ...
customer_reviews.text: It actually works. I didn't have high hopes for this; not sure why but thought I'd give it a try. But I've used it several time, it charges my controllers very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charging dock for my husband for Father's Day because all he had was the one cord that came with the PS3 originally. And this has been great to help solve the "both controllers being dead" problem. The only thing that I've noticed, to take this product from a 5 star to a 4 star, is that sometimes the charge indication light won't go from red to green even if the controller is charged. The way I have fixed this is unplugging it and plugging it back in. Not a huge deal but still slightly annoying. Nevertheless we love this charging station.
customer_reviews.author: SBunn

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3 so far...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these as gifts so far. I do not own a Playstation 3, but (obviously) know a few people that do. Each one of them have exclaimed how much they liked having this Charging System for their wireless controllers. It's small enough that it sits out of the way, and I've been told the remotes hold the charge very well. And the price is right. Which is why I've bought 3. I've also bought the same item for the XBox 360 as a gift as well from the same company (also from Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: emeraldrose4

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is awesome, it lets you place two controllers infront and charge them both while not connected to the console at all. It has a LED system in the front that glows around the top of the controller when its connected to the charger it will glow red if its charging or green if its fully charged. It looks pretty awesome too, it comes in a shiny black plastic design and is very easy to use. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a way to keep their controllers charged up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. Remotes arnt strung all over or piled up unorganized. I love organization and there's nothing worse than have to to play a game with a cord in your remote bra use its dead. No remotes have a home and they r always charged. Deffenitly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Barker

customer_reviews.title: Marginal quality
customer_reviews.text: This product worked for about 4 months. Then it went down hill. The PS3 controllers wouldn't charge when they were put on the stand. The connections became loose very early in the process. I could understand that if the children were very small, but we were very careful to put them on the charging stand with as little wear as possible and the thing still broke/didn't work after only a few months and less than 100 charges.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a way to charge my game pads without hooking them up to the PS3. The Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play Charging System solved that problem for me. It really works great and holds the game pads in place nice and secure. I like the red and green light when you put the game pads in to tell you if it is charged (green light) or if it is charging (red light), plus it looks really cool and the design fits with the PS3 design. I would recommend this to anyone with a PS3.
customer_reviews.author: Framyr M. A.

customer_reviews.title: better than the usual
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on how well this product would work but i wanted something that looked good and did not occupy my usb ports on my PS3. I must admit that this product is of very good quality and functions very well. I'm notorious for leaving my controllers out and then when it came time for me to play my controllers would be dead. Now they are always fully charged and ready to go. Great product as compared to my previous charging stations
customer_reviews.author: AceNLex82

customer_reviews.title: Why are these not standard?
customer_reviews.text: This seems like something Sony should think about including with their PlayStations. I have a kitten who loves to chew cords. After the second PS3 controller cord that she chewed we had to do something. This is a great solution! The only negative is that it's sometimes hard to plug the controller into the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Shanbear16

customer_reviews.title: Decent charging system
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have found with this charging system is that it isnt the easiest thing to do trying to get the controller in to charge but it works well. I have friends with a similiar charger and they have the same complaint and one of them the plugin on the charger broke......hence the difficulty in trying to get the controller on the charger. Seller was great, fast shipping. Will buy from again if the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Fireball

customer_reviews.title: Good way to charge the controllers offline
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent way to charge the controllers. It even looks nice in the living room. I researched a few different options and this was the best out there. The only concern I have is that the only real support for the controllers is the USB charge port. This may cause undue stress on the port and cause it to wear prematurely but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is most convent charging station to use. I just plug it in and set it right there and keep my game controller in place. Its really perfect for any person who loves to keep there game controller in order and in place. That's why I recommend this to anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Cornelis Rillen

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: This thing does exactly what it's designed for, which is charging your ps3 controllers. On top of that it looks pretty nice despite being almost entirely plastic. It's something that you don't mind sitting out in your living room for all to see. In my opinion, it actually makes your controllers look nicer/neater when their plugged in on your entertainment unit.
customer_reviews.author: gadgetman

customer_reviews.title: Great little charger with multiple options
customer_reviews.text: This is prefect for the original controllers! BEWARE - the two slots do not fit my 3rd party Afterglow controllers BUT this thing has two sweet side USB ports that I just plug my controllers in with the standard controller cable instead, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Hamean

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommned for PS3 Controllers
customer_reviews.text: This clearly communicates which controller has a full charge and which one is still charging. It also has allowed up to clean up the USB charging cable mess by neatly plugging this device into the wall, and then each controller goes into one of the slots which just looks neater.
customer_reviews.author: Paul's Tool Review

customer_reviews.title: Not only sexy looking but great product for a gamer and a girl gamer at that :)
customer_reviews.text: I can now finally say I am a happy gamer girl to complete my Energizer charging stations with buying the PS3 station. I now own all (xbox, wii u, and PS3) and love them all. One thing I would recommend from energizer is to put an off button on the stand this way we can just keep the controllers stationary for when not in use. Highly recommend the Energizer charging stations to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dan & Marcella

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have had this charger for almost 3 years now and it had worked very well until a couple weeks ago. The connections are getting loose now and it takes a bit of wiggling to get the light to come on and the controllers to charge. Considering the amount of abuse it has received from my son and his friends, and the price, I think it has done very well to hold up this long. Good value in my opinion, and now am purchasing a new one to replace it :) Update: 3 years later and we've had to purchase replacement controllers, but this second charger is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Williams

customer_reviews.title: I owned the first one for 8 years and it worked fine, which is I suppose the most I could ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my old charger, which was exactly the same. I owned the first one for 8 years and it worked fine, which is I suppose the most I could hope for out of something of this price. It was a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and Looks Cool.
customer_reviews.text: "Works Great and Looks Cool." This is great for people with two controllers who like to show of their gear. The lights are bright, but only if you are bothered by that stuff if your trying to fall asleep. I however just keep this in my TV room. It looks great and works great, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JFunk

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this charger is excellent. its a great way to charge your controller without using your ps3. i would recommend it for sure. i will also buy this charger for the ps4 when i get my ps4 in the future. looks real nice as well. the lights on the charger makes it look modern and kool. i like the fact that its vertical which takes up less space.
customer_reviews.author: partyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Playstation 3 Energizer Power and Play Charging System
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! This is one of the best purchases my husband and I have ever made! We only have two controllers, which is perfect because that is all this charging dock holds. It also holds my headset so it always has a full charge. The price for this item on Amazon was amazing, about 10 dollars cheaper than any store I have searched! The package was undamaged... The only reason this product gets a 4 out of 5 stars is because the headset jack is loose.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to.... mostly
customer_reviews.text: It charges my two controllers just fine. The USB port will not charge my wireless headset. I don't know if it is the power-tower or the headset. Kind of a bummer as the headset must be charged by the PS3 and the PS3 must be fully on to charge it. You don't want to forget that your PS3 is on or it may overheat.
customer_reviews.author: N. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Never have a dead controller or headset again!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. My PS3 is part of my Home Theater system and it was a pain to always plug in the controller and headset after every gaming session. My headset in particular never got a full charge between gaming sessions. This unit eliminates the problem, I put this badboy on an end table next to the couch, easy to plug in and easy to remove. Also, looks great!! Actually, very stylish. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Fred C.

customer_reviews.title: Works but as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in good shape. Installed the tower arm and put two new controllers on it to charge. The lights showed red (charging) but did not turn green to show the controllers were fully charged. This may be a minor issue, but can be confusing to someone looking to see if controllers are fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Joe7284

customer_reviews.title: Best Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for christmas last year and it was the sleeper gift! It's great because it fits out of the way and doesn't take up a slot on the playstation. Also it doesn't hurt the controllers if you leave them plugged in after they are fully charged. I highly recommend this to anyone who likes to keep their back up controllers fully charged!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this charger! Works great! Light is red when charging and green when finished, so you know when to take it off. Has it's own power source so you done have to take up a USB port on your console. I would buy this all over again. Super item! I think the Playstation should come standard with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Makes charging my ps3 controllers very easy and the green/red charger helps me know when I ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes charging my ps3 controllers very easy and the green/red charger helps me know when I can get back to marathon gaming. :)
customer_reviews.author: candyman

customer_reviews.title: Works well but lights stopped working correctly after 10 months
customer_reviews.text: It's a cool design and charges fairly well. However, after just under a year of use, the lights do not work correctly (giving us a green when the controller was just put on to charge and knowing it had a low battery). Would I but this again, probably.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: The charger arrived very quickly. The product description was very accurate. Charging time was shorter than the time described on the box. The only complaint I have is when placing the controllers on the chargers, it takes a little bit of moving around the controllers to hook them up because the connectors are really small. Other than that, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: abe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two charging systems and this one is the superior one by far. I have had no problems with this product at all, plus it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Energizer gets my kudos for this product. The biggest complaint with the PS3 I had was that usually when I'm done playing, i would shut off the system. But shutting it down doesn't allow the controllers to charge! Not only does this allow me to charge my controllers when the systems off it has 2 additional USB ports for additional controllers, headset, or keypad charging. This product also frees up the USBs on the system for other things, such as Rock band peripherals, receivers, etc... 100% Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Carner

customer_reviews.title: Reduces cord tangle and clutter!
customer_reviews.text: This device is great because I don't have to deal with cable tangle, and I have a place to organize the PS3 controllers. The light turns green once the controller is charged, which is very handy! I wish they still made the version with the extra USB pass-through ports, but this one does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great charger
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my old spare controller would disconnect even though I put new batteries in it, so I got this so I could play Disney Inffinity with my nieces and nephews when they came over. I love it it charges well and I like the light it makes it easy to tell when the battery is charged.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Elizabeth Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Great design, works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today for $9.95!! Amazon's Black Friday was awesome. This charger not only looks great and matches my home system set up perfectly it also works as advertised. I don't find the lights too bright or distracting but mine is tucked away so I don't notice them. Great item and sure beats the heck out of charging my PS3 controllers with the USB cables.
customer_reviews.author: G. Chadwell

customer_reviews.title: worked well the first few months
customer_reviews.text: worked well the first few months - then one of the plug-ins failed to charge. the other continues to work well - had been an attractive space saver - now it takes up more room (because of the failed receptacle)
customer_reviews.author: P. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent charger
customer_reviews.text: This thing was quite a nice surprise. It looks cool sitting next to my PS3 and doubles as a controller holder. It's certainly easier than attaching the USB cables and leaving the PS3 to charge the controllers My only negatives are: The controllers don't always attach with ease (probably has more to do with the mini-usb connector that the charger) The $29.99 price tag is a tad steep for just a charger (I was fortunate to nab this on sale for $19)
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Eischens

customer_reviews.title: Good product!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this cause I went out n bought a PS3,which this is the very 1st game product I ever bought,and dont like to wait for recharging for anything. It is extremely good for dual charging,now if only I can figure out how to play 2 people at once on it( my GF n me). Although, sometimes I put the upper one in n I have to reinstall it,for some reason. But it does do Great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen K.

customer_reviews.title: It live up to the Energizer name.
customer_reviews.text: This works great I fine it easy to connect the game controllers on and easy to remove, I will say use common sense and show your kids not to force them on or yank them off. You get red lights for charging and green for complete plus you get a 6ft AC wall unit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Charges rapidly
customer_reviews.text: difficult to insert the controllers into the stand, but does the job well otherwise. Lets you know with a green light when the controllers are fully charged. I suspect the problems some folks have mentioned are related to lack of care when inserting the controllers into the charger - which, as I've already said, is not easy.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Nice little charger
customer_reviews.text: Love this product it did as advertise and the green light too show its charged is really nice I would give it a five but it is sometimes hard to plug the controller in but after a few angles it locks in this is a very nice product cause it charges in less than 20 mins which is nice I fully recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Bowleglewie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended and no issues thus far been using for a few weeks now. Keeps my controllers ready to go I rotate my three. Solid and not loose like other reviews said. Took a second to get used to putting them in but unless your ripping them out then they should never be loose.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: so far I'm pretty impressed with it
customer_reviews.text: so far I'm pretty impressed with it. It holds the remote steady and I especially like the color coded lights in order to tell the difference between charging and fully charged. Good product for the money
customer_reviews.author: draimer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works good
customer_reviews.text: Works good and looks good, but it is a little difficult to plug the controller into it without knocking the other one out.
customer_reviews.author: J. Belding

customer_reviews.title: Stores and chargers my controllers
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as advertised, the lights are a nice addition to make it look cool. The only problem i have is not my problem, but my wife has difficulty getting the controllers onto the charging station but i have no problems so it can be slightly difficult to use if you are not very dexterous. Durability so far is good as my cats run into it on occasion and it hasn't broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: TRB

customer_reviews.title: Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play Charging System
customer_reviews.text: First I bought this for fun, then when i had to buy an additional new controller I saw the need for a charger. This charger is quite cool, shows red when it is charging but as soon as controller is charged it shows green, however this doesn't work for fake controllers unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: sebabs32

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a controller charger on Ebay that was of inferior quality and returned it almost immediately. This charger works great! It is good quality, and if you are still plugging you controller into the mini usb on your system then this is a must have! It plugs directly into the wall and even has two extra usb ports to charge a 3rd and 4th controller.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfiedsoul

customer_reviews.title: it has a nice indicator of when its charging and when its done ...
customer_reviews.text: it has a nice indicator of when its charging and when its done it charges pretty quickly and its cool that it has the Bluetooth headset charger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Diggler

customer_reviews.title: Frustration Over
customer_reviews.text: It is so frustrating to sit down and try to relax and play a game only to find the controller dead. The cord was way too short to play with it attached and this charging station (Plugged in right next to the couch) makes sure that the controllers stay fully charged no matter if the system is on or not.
customer_reviews.author: david brock

customer_reviews.title: Great controller station
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good charging station for your remotes. Only issue is that the bluetooth charger only accommodates a certain ps3 bluetooth. Its not a big deal though because you can remove that side dock thing and theres a usb cable that allows you to plug a usb bluetooth charger cable and charge it that way. Overall happy and would recommend this. I definitely like the lights as well.
customer_reviews.author: boss#

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet effective
customer_reviews.text: I'm no expert on anything related to video games, but my kids are, and they love this item. It's very easy to get the controllers connected and the unit does a great job of charging, but not overcharging. And the red and greem lights look really cool as well. My wife even allows the unit to be seen! Its very nice to not have to mess with USB cords.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It charges my controller and does it fast. Very happy with this charger. It is however a bit large so it's a bit hard to find a good place to put it but realistically I use it maybe once every two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: myhaksown

customer_reviews.title: Works well, can be difficult to get the controller in the second position
customer_reviews.text: Title pretty much says it all. Works exactly as intended, but it can be a little tricky to get the controller into the top slot when the other controller is present. It's nothing worth NOT buying for though, just worth mentioning.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: After using this product for more than 3 years I can safely say I have never had any problems with it. It made the whole process go by much quicker since I didn't need to use the charging cables whenever the ps3 remote died. Instead I can just always have them charged and ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveTitan

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: This revolutionized our storage and functionality of our PS3 controllers. My only regret is not purchasing these sooner. Love, love, love this charger.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I didn't like about this product was that it doesn't have a button to turn it on or off.. You need to plugged in to charge and unplugged once you finished the charging. For me it turns out annoying because sometimes I forget to unplugged it and I leave the thing ON all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Juan C. Guerreo Moya

customer_reviews.title: ps3 recharging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me in the living room for my PS3, looks great & works great. It's sleek design is awesome, it doesn't plug into system like other recharge stations, it plugs into wall. All the plugs were included with this item.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Charge me up
customer_reviews.text: If you have two controllers then you need one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

product_meta.title: Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play Charging System
product_meta.description: Charge two Playstation 3 controllers simultaneously in just 2.5 hours with Energizer's Power & Play Charging System. The charge base offers a sleek and unique design that is impressive and functional. The station lets you know when it’s charging via the connection by appearing in red light (charging) and green (fully charged). It is powered by the included UL-approved AC power cord. Keep those controllers charged and get back in the game with fully licensed Energizer Power & Play Charging System for the Playstation 3 by PDP.
feature_bullets: Playstation 3 Energizer Power & Play Charging System

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars764 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
